title: Journalist Nahid Riyasad dies
body: Nahid Riyasad, the in-charge of the national desk at the Times of Bangladesh, died early Wednesday. He was 38. He died of a heart attack about 2:15am at his house at Rayerbazar in Dhaka, the family said. Nahid had a chest pain and was taken to Ibne Sina Hospital at Dhanmondi where he was pronounced dead. His burial will take place after his namaz-e-janaza in his home town of Narayanganj after his sister’s return from abroad. Nahid, who began working with Newsnextbd.com in February 2012, joined New Age in September 2017 and moved to Drik Picture Library in July 2023 before joining the Times of Bangladesh in July 2025. He did his master’s in English literature and cultural studies at the University of Liberal Arts, Bangladesh in 2017.
